quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
name: George Sand

quote: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
name: Jenn Proske

quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
name: John Wooden

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
name: Brad Henry

quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
name: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: Beauty is when you can appreciate yourself. When you love yourself, that's when you're most beautiful.
name: Zoe Kravitz

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
name: Euripides

quote: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
name: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
name: Og Mandino

quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
name: Satchel Paige

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
name: Rumi

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Mother's love is peace. It need not be acquired, it need not be deserved.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself.
name: Josh Billings

quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
name: Theodore Hesburgh

quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
name: Dale Evans

quote: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
name: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
name: Max Muller

quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
name: Richard Bach

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
name: Kinky Friedman

quote: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
name: Jesus Christ

quote: Never make a decision when you are upset, sad, jealous or in love.
name: Mario Teguh

quote: A dog will teach you unconditional love. If you can have that in your life, things won't be too bad.
name: Robert Wagner

quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
name: Brian Tracy

quote: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else.
name: John Keats

quote: Where we love is home - home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: It is a fine seasoning for joy to think of those we love.
name: Moliere

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
name: Unknown

quote: Don't forget to tell yourself positive things daily! You must love yourself internally to glow externally.
name: Hannah Bronfman

quote: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
name: Charles Morgan

quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Let no one who loves be unhappy, even love unreturned has its rainbow.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: No matter how you're feeling, a little dog gunna love you.
name: Waka Flocka Flame

quote: A flower doesn't love you or hate you, it just exists.
name: Mike White

quote: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night.
name: A. J. McLean

quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
name: Ferdinand Foch

quote: I really just want to be warm yellow light that pours over everyone I love.
name: Conor Oberst

quote: As the Father has loved me, so have I loved you.
name: Jesus Christ

quote: I love the feeling of the fresh air on my face and the wind blowing through my hair.
name: Evel Knievel

quote: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure; Love is a flower, you've got to let it grow.
name: John Lennon

quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I love looking in the mirror and feeling good about what I see.
name: Heather Morris

quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
name: Franklin P. Jones

quote: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
name: John Galsworthy

quote: We are all born for love. It is the principle of existence, and its only end.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Be beautiful, be stylish, and love yourself.
name: Karishma Tanna

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
name: Buddha

quote: Love is flower like; Friendship is like a sheltering tree.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: If we lose love and self respect for each other, this is how we finally die.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: No matter how dark the moment, love and hope are always possible.
name: George Chakiris

quote: Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.
name: Robert Browning

quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
name: Frank Sinatra

quote: True love stories never have endings.
name: Richard Bach

quote: My number one goal is to love, support and be there for my son.
name: Farrah Fawcett

quote: It's hard asking someone with a broken heart to fall in love again.
name: Eric Kripke

quote: Life is a game and true love is a trophy.
name: Rufus Wainwright

quote: If music be the food of love, play on.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: We never know the love of a parent till we become parents ourselves.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Enjoy the journey and try to get better every day. And don't lose the passion and the love for what you do.
name: Nadia Comaneci

quote: We are born of love; Love is our mother.
name: Rumi

quote: Where there is love there is life.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The love of a mother is the veil of a softer light between the heart and the heavenly Father.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
name: Erich Fromm

quote: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.
name: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: The regret of my life is that I have not said 'I love you' often enough.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax.
name: Christian Louboutin

quote: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.
name: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: True love is selfless. It is prepared to sacrifice.
name: Sadhu Vaswani

quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: There's a saying. If you want someone to love you forever, buy a dog, feed it and keep it around.
name: Dick Dale

quote: Believe in yourself, listen to your gut, and do what you love.
name: Dylan Lauren

quote: I love the sounds and the power of pounding water, whether it is the waves or a waterfall.
name: Mike May

quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
name: John Lennon

quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Jealousy is just love and hate at the same time.
name: Drake

quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: We live in the world when we love it.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: True love doesn't come to you it has to be inside you.
name: Julia Roberts

quote: True love cannot be found where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does.
name: Torquato Tasso

quote: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.
name: Marc Anthony

quote: Dare, dream, dance, smile, and sing loudly! And have faith that love is an unstoppable force!
name: Suzanne Brockmann

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Love may be or it may not, but where it is, it ought to reveal itself in its immensity.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: If you want to love others, I think you should love yourself first.
name: RM

quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: You give loyalty, you'll get it back. You give love, you'll get it back.
name: Tommy Lasorda

quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
name: Ingrid Bergman

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
name: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Love is an ice cream sundae, with all the marvelous coverings. Sex is the cherry on top.
name: Jimmy Dean

quote: The love of a dog is a pure thing. He gives you a trust which is total. You must not betray it.
name: Michel Houellebecq

quote: I am blessed to be surrounded by the people I love. I thank them for their patience and grace.
name: Matt Lauer

quote: Let us love winter, for it is the spring of genius.
name: Pietro Aretino

quote: I absolutely love spending time with my family.
name: Kevin Alejandro

quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
name: John Updike

quote: I love you - I am at rest with you - I have come home.
name: Dorothy L. Sayers

quote: I try to say I love you in a million different ways. That's what I aspire to do. That's what I do best.
name: Christine McVie

quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: No one has ever loved anyone the way everyone wants to be loved.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: With love and patience, nothing is impossible.
name: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
name: David Frost

quote: Love is not to be purchased, and affection has no price.
name: St. Jerome

quote: Kindness in women, not their beauteous looks, shall win my love.
name: Washington Irving

quote: I love it when people doubt me. It makes me work harder to prove them wrong.
name: Derek Jeter

quote: People confuse ego, lust, insecurity with true love.
name: Simon Cowell

quote: But the love of adventure was in father's blood.
name: Buffalo Bill

quote: I love the beach. I love the sea. All my life I live within - in front of the sea.
name: Rafael Nadal

quote: Life is measured in love and positive contributions and moments of grace.
name: Carly Fiorina

quote: For me, cooking is an extension of love.
name: Hedda Sterne

quote: I love to sit on a mountain top and gaze. I don't think of anything but the people I care about and the view.
name: Julian Lennon

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: A kiss is a secret told to the mouth instead of the ear; kisses are the messengers of love and tenderness.
name: Ingrid Bergman

quote: I love the smell of rain, and I love the sound of the ocean waves.
name: Amy Purdy

quote: I'm very happy being me, although sometimes I'd love to be a bird so that I could fly.
name: Joy Fielding

quote: I love natural beauty, and I think it's your best look, but I think makeup as an artist is so transformative.
name: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: I knew I was going to love my daughter, but I had no idea how much I would love her.
name: Jeremy Sisto

quote: I love to smile, even through pain.
name: Victoria Arlen

quote: I love to be outdoors, so I like to hike, bike and go to the beach.
name: Jillian Rose Reed

quote: What a man takes in by contemplation, that he pours out in love.
name: Meister Eckhart

quote: Treasure the love you receive above all. It will survive long after your good health has vanished.
name: Og Mandino

quote: An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person.
name: Zoe Foster Blake

quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Food, to me, is always about cooking and eating with those you love and care for.
name: David Chang

quote: I love coming back home and seeing old friends and family. I would say it keeps me grounded.
name: Coy Bowles

quote: My eye is ever on those who love me.
name: Sai Baba

quote: Love begins by taking care of the closest ones - the ones at home.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Falling in love and having a relationship are two different things.
name: Keanu Reeves

quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: What I love most about this crazy life is the adventure of it.
name: Juliette Binoche

quote: If you can make a living doing what you love, that is a blessing.
name: David A. R. White

quote: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Love planted a rose, and the world turned sweet.
name: Katharine Lee Bates

quote: I love when I teach my son a good lesson. But I love it even more when he teaches me.
name: Brad Meltzer

quote: Don't threaten me with love, baby. Let's just go walking in the rain.
name: Billie Holiday

quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: If fear is the great enemy of intimacy, love is its true friend.
name: Henri Nouwen

quote: 'Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: Love is friendship set on fire.
name: Jeremy Taylor

quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.
name: William Blake

quote: Thank you, God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough.
name: Garrison Keillor

quote: Girls we love for what they are; young men for what they promise to be.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Communism is not love. Communism is a hammer which we use to crush the enemy.
name: Mao Zedong

quote: Nothing can bring a real sense of security into the home except true love.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Football is unconditional love.
name: Tom Brady

quote: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.
name: Nicholas Sparks

quote: If you don't love me, it does not matter, anyway I can love for both of us.
name: Stendhal

quote: Love and a red rose can't be hid.
name: Thomas Holcroft

quote: I love you more than my own skin.
name: Frida Kahlo

quote: I know what it is like to be brought up with unconditional love. In my life that came from my grandmother.
name: Andre Leon Talley

quote: However rare true love may be, it is less so than true friendship.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I don't have time for hobbies. At the end of the day, I treat my job as a hobby. It's something I love doing.
name: David Beckham

quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: I have eclectic taste, and I love vintage style mixed with glamour and old world charm.
name: Sonam Kapoor

quote: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Love often wears a mask in order to test loyalty.
name: Minna Antrim

quote: Yes, it was love at first sight. I feel that after all these years, I have finally found my soul mate.
name: Barbara Hershey

quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Like love, breakfast is best when made at home.
name: Gina Barreca

quote: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do... but how much love we put in that action.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: If I love you, I show you I love you every day. Little things, big things.
name: Dwayne Johnson

quote: I love those connections that make this big old world feel like a little village.
name: Gina Bellman

quote: Everyone feels like family and I am back in the city that I love.
name: Chris Noth

quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.
name: Corita Kent

quote: Death and love are the two wings that bear the good man to heaven.
name: Michelangelo

quote: To say 'I love you' one must first be able to say the 'I.'
name: Ayn Rand

quote: Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; its eyes are for the stars.
name: Gilbert Parker

quote: In modeling, I had to learn to like myself, to love myself, to feel comfortable.
name: Mariacarla Boscono

quote: You don't have to deserve your mother's love. You have to deserve your father's.
name: Robert Frost

quote: I don't love studying. I hate studying. I like learning. Learning is beautiful.
name: Natalie Portman

quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
name: John Ruskin

quote: I love making new friends and I respect people for a lot of different reasons.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: Even when I'm sick and depressed, I love life.
name: Arthur Rubinstein

quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
name: Aristotle

quote: I feel that there is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.
name: Lord Byron

quote: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply.
name: Zane Grey

quote: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: Do what you love. Know your own bone; gnaw at it, bury it, unearth it, and gnaw it still.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: As I'm getting older, I'm really learning unconditional love and loyalty are extremely important.
name: Bindi Irwin

quote: I love my mother and father. The older I get, the more I value everything that they gave me.
name: Liev Schreiber

quote: Love is moral even without legal marriage, but marriage is immoral without love.
name: Ellen Key

quote: I love dressing for the winter - especially in baggy chunky cardigans.
name: Pixie Lott

quote: Grief is the price we pay for love.
name: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: Love in its essence is spiritual fire.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Your duty is to treat everybody with love as a manifestation of the Lord.
name: Swami Sivananda

quote: The ultimate dream in life is to be able to do what you love and learn something from it.
name: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: I love my wife, she deserves anything and everything.
name: Aaron Spelling

quote: I love my son more than anything. I will do whatever it takes to make sure he is raised the right way.
name: Bristol Palin

quote: That's what I love about dance. It makes you happy, fully happy.
name: Debbie Reynolds

quote: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Win, lose or draw, you're all my cousins and I love you.
name: Chill Wills

quote: You can be rich in spirit, kindness, love and all those things that you can't put a dollar sign on.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: One way to feel good about yourself is to love yourself... to take care of yourself.
name: Goldie Hawn

quote: When you look into the eyes of an animal you've rescued, you can't help but fall in love.
name: Paul Shaffer

quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
name: Charles Kuralt

quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: Nothing can replace sleep, but coffee can do it best. I love coffee.
name: Kelley O'Hara

quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
name: Buddha

quote: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.
name: Lord Byron

quote: You don't walk away if you love someone. You help the person.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Don't forget to love yourself.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: I love cats because I enjoy my home; and little by little, they become its visible soul.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: Who would give a law to lovers? Love is unto itself a higher law.
name: Boethius

quote: I've only been in love with a beer bottle and a mirror.
name: Sid Vicious

quote: Often real life is boring and problematic. I love the edited version of it.
name: Terry Gross

quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Love is a serious mental disease.
name: Plato

quote: He who does not love his own language is worse than an animal and smelly fish.
name: Jose Rizal

quote: Let's practice motivation and love, not discrimination and hate.
name: Zendaya

quote: Give a child love, laughter and peace, not AIDS.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: To me, a forever love is a bond that can't be broken.
name: Nick Cannon

quote: I just love pretty things, whether it is art, a song or a pair of shoes.
name: Rita Ora

quote: I love the beach, and I love sunshine.
name: Megan Fox

quote: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
name: Carl Sagan

quote: I love when people underestimate me and then become pleasantly surprised.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: I always look forward to the holidays because I love dressing up in festive, shimmery evening dresses.
name: Hilary Rhoda

quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: The moment I first heard love I gave up my soul, my heart, and my eyes.
name: Rumi

quote: Pure love is a willingness to give without a thought of receiving anything in return.
name: Peace Pilgrim

quote: I do love my hometown. It really forged who I am in a major way.
name: Dave Filoni

quote: Love is the greatest gift that God has given us. It's free.
name: Taraji P. Henson

quote: Self-love is the source of all our other loves.
name: Pierre Corneille

quote: Our first and last love is self-love.
name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: I believe in true love, and I believe in happy endings. And I believe.
name: Christie Brinkley

quote: I love being my husband's wife.
name: Julianna Margulies

quote: Go out into the world with your passion and love for what you do, and just never give up.
name: Dianne Reeves

quote: The way to know life is to love many things.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
name: Tom Robbins

quote: Love is pure and true; love knows no gender.
name: Tori Spelling

quote: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God.
name: Lawrence Welk

quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.
name: Peter Ustinov

quote: Love in the real world means saying you're sorry 10 times a day.
name: Kathie Lee Gifford

quote: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I love walking down the street and seeing faces and drama and happiness and sadness and dirt and cleanliness.
name: Ric Ocasek

quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Love the giver more than the gift.
name: Brigham Young

quote: As soon go kindle fire with snow, as seek to quench the fire of love with words.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: You're imperfect, and you're wired for struggle, but you are worthy of love and belonging.
name: Brene Brown

quote: A first love is something that lasts forever in your heart. It's something that marks you.
name: Elodie Yung

quote: A flower falls, even though we love it; and a weed grows, even though we do not love it.
name: Dogen

quote: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
name: Arthur Rubinstein

quote: The purest and most thoughtful minds are those which love colour the most.
name: John Ruskin

quote: If your heart is a volcano, how shall you expect flowers to bloom?
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Whatever is done for love always occurs beyond good and evil.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Always be kind, especially in times when it seems like everyone is giving up on each other. Love harder.
name: Madeline Brewer

quote: At the center of non-violence stands the principle of love.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The past explains how I got here, but the future is up to me - and I love to live life at full throttle.
name: Janice Dickinson

quote: The best proof of love is trust.
name: Joyce Brothers

quote: Touch seems to be as essential as sunlight.
name: Diane Ackerman

quote: I do not want a husband who honours me as a queen, if he does not love me as a woman.
name: Elizabeth I

quote: I have my flaws, but I embrace them and I love them because they're mine.
name: Winnie Harlow

quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Down on your knees, and thank heaven, fasting, for a good man's love.
name: Euripides

quote: I love getting dressed up in a suit because I don't do it all the time.
name: Jason Statham

quote: You don't have to have a ring on your finger to say, 'I love you.'
name: Tyra Banks

quote: If I love you, what business is it of yours?
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: You gotta love livin', baby, 'cause dyin' is a pain in the ass.
name: Frank Sinatra

quote: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: Being in love with somebody is a wonderful feeling.
name: Shane Warne

quote: Racing is what I love, so it's pretty simple. I want to keep doing it and keep winning.
name: Lewis Hamilton

quote: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Love is not altogether a delirium, yet it has many points in common therewith.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I love being outdoors. I love just spending time in the sun and hanging out with my friends.
name: Nina Agdal

quote: Setting my mind on a musical instrument was like falling in love. All the world seemed bright and changed.
name: William Christopher Handy

quote: My love for ice cream emerged at an early age - and has never left!
name: Ginger Rogers

quote: I love to go shopping and see what catches my eye.
name: Patrick Schwarzenegger

quote: I love you all too much, it's one of just of my problems.
name: Herve Villechaize

quote: I love the desert and its incomparable sense of space.
name: Robyn Davidson

quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
name: George Eliot

quote: I love nerdy, cute, quirky boys who don't take themselves too seriously.
name: Ariana Grande

quote: When you lose a person you love so much, surviving the loss is difficult.
name: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: He who loves with purity considers not the gift of the lover, but the love of the giver.
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Unable are the loved to die, for love is immortality.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: I'm really not that funny in real life! But I am the best audience one could find. I love to laugh.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: There is no right time and right place for love... it can happen any time.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: Pets have more love and compassion in them than most humans.
name: Robert Wagner

quote: Love is the most important thing in the world, but baseball is pretty good, too.
name: Yogi Berra

quote: Love God; love others; do your best in all you do, even if you fall short!
name: Bethany Hamilton

quote: The struggle of my life created empathy - I could relate to pain, being abandoned, having people not love me.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: I was born with an enormous need for affection, and a terrible need to give it.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: I rise to taste the dawn, and find that love alone will shine today.
name: Ken Wilber

quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
name: Plato

quote: I'm nutty bunny number two. I love me and I love you.
name: Mark McKinney

quote: Courage is like love; it must have hope for nourishment.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: I have learnt one thing in life: that if you love someone, you have to accept that person with his/her flaws.
name: Shaheer Sheikh

quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Love and friendship exclude each other.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: It's really important to talk to yourself and look at yourself in the mirror and love who you are.
name: Lilly Singh

quote: May my soul bloom in love for all existence.
name: Rudolf Steiner

quote: Life is too short to do the things you don't love doing.
name: Bruce Dickinson

quote: I love history... everything is inspired by history, so that's why I love vintage and antiques.
name: Kelly Wearstler

quote: Love unlocks doors and opens windows that weren't even there before.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Being transgender isn't a medical transition. It's a process of learning to love yourself for who you are.
name: Jazz Jennings

quote: Love will draw an elephant through a key-hole.
name: Samuel Richardson

quote: Yeah, I love doing ensemble pieces. You get to meet so many new people and make new friends.
name: Devon Sawa

quote: All, everything that I understand, I understand only because I love.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: I love shifting between being super cute and aggressive. It's funny.
name: Sigrid

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough is love.
name: Henry Miller

quote: Fortune and love favor the brave.
name: Ovid

quote: I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: Do all things with love.
name: Og Mandino

quote: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
name: Dwight L. Moody

quote: I hope you love birds too. It is economical. It saves going to heaven.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Never pretend to a love which you do not actually feel, for love is not ours to command.
name: Alan Watts

quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Romance is tempestuous. Love is calm.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: We are driven by five genetic needs: survival, love and belonging, power, freedom, and fun.
name: William Glasser

quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
name: Loretta Young

quote: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Suffering passes, while love is eternal. That's a gift that you have received from God. Don't waste it.
name: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: If you do not love me I shall not be loved If I do not love you I shall not love.
name: Samuel Beckett

quote: We may give without loving, but we cannot love without giving.
name: Bernard Meltzer

quote: The ear is the avenue to the heart.
name: Voltaire

quote: The praise that comes from love does not make us vain, but more humble.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: What a cruel thing war is... to fill our hearts with hatred instead of love for our neighbors.
name: Robert E. Lee

quote: If we love our country, we should also love our countrymen.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: A pair of powerful spectacles has sometimes sufficed to cure a person in love.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
name: Plato

quote: I like to peel it and share it with friends. You can spread the love with an orange.
name: Gina Rodriguez

quote: Who, being loved, is poor?
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: To love is to admire with the heart; to admire is to love with the mind.
name: Theophile Gautier

quote: I love seafood. I'm not a vegetarian but I'm probably a pescetarian.
name: Padma Lakshmi

quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Love is blind.
name: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: There is always something left to love. And if you ain't learned that, you ain't learned nothing.
name: Lorraine Hansberry

quote: To be able to say how much love, is love but little.
name: Petrarch

quote: There are more people who wish to be loved than there are who are willing to love.
name: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: It's important for us to latch onto the people that we love.
name: Connie Stevens

quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Love is an endless mystery, for it has nothing else to explain it.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Who ever loved that loved not at first sight?
name: Christopher Marlowe

quote: We are never so defensless against suffering as when we love.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: I'd rather be a failure at something I love than a success at something I hate.
name: George Burns

quote: Love is when he gives you a piece of your soul, that you never knew was missing.
name: Torquato Tasso

quote: Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love, to work, to play, and to look up at the stars.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Love cannot save you from your own fate.
name: Jim Morrison

quote: I don't date my girlfriend because she's a model. I date her because I love her.
name: Adam Levine

quote: It is not love that should be depicted as blind, but self-love.
name: Voltaire

quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
name: Robert Frost

quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
name: Paul Tillich

quote: Love is my religion - I could die for it.
name: John Keats

quote: No individual, regardless of where they live or whom they love, should suffer discrimination.
name: Kate Brown

quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
name: James Baldwin

quote: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.
name: Erich Segal

quote: Love is like an hourglass, with the heart filling up as the brain empties.
name: Jules Renard

quote: Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
name: Emily Bronte

quote: A gentle heart is tied with an easy thread.
name: George Herbert

quote: Love is the only gold.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: We love because it's the only true adventure.
name: Nikki Giovanni

quote: If you wished to be loved, love.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Love is the best thing in the world, and the thing that lives the longest.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: If you want to be loved, be lovable.
name: Ovid

quote: Love is a springtime plant that perfumes everything with its hope, even the ruins to which it clings.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.
name: Anais Nin

quote: We can only learn to love by loving.
name: Iris Murdoch

quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool and the folly of the wise.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Love can be unselfish, in the sense of being benevolent and generous, without being selfless.
name: Mortimer Adler

quote: Love is love's reward.
name: John Dryden

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
name: Eva Gabor

quote: Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Who so loves believes the impossible.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Love him and let him love you. Do you think anything else under heaven really matters?
name: James Baldwin

quote: Familiar acts are beautiful through love.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: To witness two lovers is a spectacle for the gods.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
name: Javan

quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Bitterness imprisons life; love releases it.
name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
name: Leigh Hunt

quote: Love cures people - both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
name: Karl A. Menninger

quote: When love is not madness, it is not love.
name: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: We need 4 hugs a day for survival. We need 8 hugs a day for maintenance. We need 12 hugs a day for growth.
name: Virginia Satir

quote: This love is silent.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: Though lovers be lost, love shall not.
name: Dylan Thomas

quote: Be of love a little more careful than of anything.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: To good and true love fear is forever affixed.
name: Francois Rabelais

quote: If thou must love me, let it be for naught except for love's sake only.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: There is more pleasure in loving than in being beloved.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: People protect what they love.
name: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: Love means to love that which is unlovable; or it is no virtue at all.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Love means not ever having to say you're sorry.
name: Erich Segal

quote: Everything is clearer when you're in love.
name: John Lennon

quote: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: The love we have in our youth is superficial compared to the love that an old man has for his old wife.
name: Will Durant

quote: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
name: David Wilkerson

quote: Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: When love is at its best, one loves so much that he cannot forget.
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: The first magic of love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Love's greatest gift is its ability to make everything it touches sacred.
name: Barbara De Angelis

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
name: David Viscott

quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in others, and the delight in the recognition.
name: Alexander Smith

quote: Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.
name: Duke Ellington

quote: Love is suffering. One side always loves more.
name: Catherine Deneuve

quote: Being in love is the only transcendent experience.
name: Armistead Maupin

quote: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
name: Anais Nin

quote: Passion is momentary; love is enduring.
name: John Wooden

quote: Loved. You can't use it in the past tense. Death does not stop that love at all.
name: Ken Kesey

quote: People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy.
name: Bob Hope

quote: Love conquers all.
name: Virgil

quote: Love is the poetry of the senses.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: But love's a malady without a cure.
name: John Dryden

quote: Love is being stupid together.
name: Paul Valery

quote: The journey from teaching about love to allowing myself to be loved proved much longer than I realised.
name: Henri Nouwen

quote: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Love dies only when growth stops.
name: Pearl S. Buck

quote: We cease loving ourselves if no one loves us.
name: Madame de Stael

quote: Ultimately love is everything.
name: M. Scott Peck

quote: The fate of love is that it always seems too little or too much.
name: Amelia Barr

quote: You don't have to go looking for love when it's where you come from.
name: Werner Erhard

quote: It is impossible to repent of love. The sin of love does not exist.
name: Muriel Spark

quote: Love is stronger than justice.
name: Sting

quote: There is a woman at the begining of all great things.
name: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: Love is the ultimate expression of the will to live.
name: Tom Wolfe

quote: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
name: Euripides

quote: If you would be loved, love, and be loveable.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Love is a mutual self-giving which ends in self-recovery.
name: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: Love is the difficult realization that something other than oneself is real.
name: Iris Murdoch

quote: Love is what you've been through with somebody.
name: James Thurber

quote: More than kisses, letters mingle souls.
name: John Donne

quote: Only love interests me, and I am only in contact with things that revolve around love.
name: Marc Chagall

quote: People happy in love have an air of intensity.
name: Stendhal

quote: We don't believe in rheumatism and true love until after the first attack.
name: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: Each moment of a happy lover's hour is worth an age of dull and common life.
name: Aphra Behn

quote: Love is a hole in the heart.
name: Ben Hecht

quote: One must not trifle with love.
name: Alfred de Musset

quote: Love has a tide!
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: There is no love of life without despair of life.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Lord, grant that I might not so much seek to be loved as to love.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
name: Voltaire

quote: Accustom yourself continually to make many acts of love, for they enkindle and melt the soul.
name: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: I was adored once too.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: To love is to act.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: The motto of chivalry is also the motto of wisdom; to serve all, but love only one.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: If equal affection cannot be, let the more loving be me.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: Nobody loves a woman because she is handsome or ugly, stupid or intelligent. We love because we love.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: All mankind love a lover.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Love prefers twilight to daylight.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.
name: Princess Diana

quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
name: Albert Ellis

quote: We all need each other.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: With our love, we could save the world.
name: George Harrison

quote: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Love possesses not nor will it be possessed, for love is sufficient unto love.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Love is metaphysical gravity.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Love... it surrounds every being and extends slowly to embrace all that shall be.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: The crime of loving is forgetting.
name: Maurice Chevalier

quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Only do what your heart tells you.
name: Princess Diana

quote: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Choose your love, Love your choice.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
name: Stendhal

quote: Love has reasons which reason cannot understand.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: Love is a gross exaggeration of the difference between one person and everybody else.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!
name: Lord Byron

quote: The spring of love becomes hidden and soon filled up.
name: Max Muller

quote: We can't command our love, but we can our actions.
name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: There are never enough I Love You's.
name: Lenny Bruce

quote: Love is a sacred reserve of energy; it is like the blood of spiritual evolution.
name: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'i' of loving.
name: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote: Only divine love bestows the keys of knowledge.
name: Arthur Rimbaud

quote: There is room in the smallest cottage for a happy loving pair.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: In every living thing there is the desire for love.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
name: George Eliot

quote: Absence - that common cure of love.
name: Lord Byron

quote: To love for the sake of being loved is human, but to love for the sake of loving is angelic.
name: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: Love is energy of life.
name: Robert Browning

quote: The eyes those silent tongues of love.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
name: Judy Garland

quote: The love we give away is the only love we keep.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: To love abundantly is to live abundantly, and to love forever is to live forever.
name: Henry Drummond

quote: I long for the raised voice, the howl of rage or love.
name: Leslie Fiedler

quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
name: Ben Hecht

quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: He who loves, flies, runs, and rejoices; he is free and nothing holds him back.
name: Henri Matisse

quote: There's no bad consequence to loving fully, with all your heart. You always gain by giving love.
name: Reese Witherspoon

quote: Love, having no geography, knows no boundaries.
name: Truman Capote

quote: One does not fall in love; one grows into love, and love grows in him.
name: Karl A. Menninger

quote: The sweetest noise on earth, a woman's tongue; A string which hath no discord.
name: Bryan Procter

quote: Take away love and our earth is a tomb.
name: Robert Browning

quote: To love another person is to see the face of God.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Selfishness is one of the qualities apt to inspire love.
name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplacable being.
name: Tom Robbins

quote: There is no person that love cannot heal; there is no soul that love cannot save.
name: Carlos Santana

quote: The world is not comprehensible, but it is embraceable: through the embracing of one of its beings.
name: Martin Buber

quote: Who loves, raves.
name: Lord Byron

quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.
name: George Jean Nathan

quote: Any time not spent on love is wasted.
name: Torquato Tasso

quote: Say what you will, 'tis better to be left than never to have been loved.
name: William Congreve

quote: It is love, not reason, that is stronger than death.
name: Thomas Mann

quote: He is not a lover who does not love forever.
name: Euripides

quote: Love has no errors, for all errors are the want for love.
name: William Law

quote: To enlarge or illustrate this power and effect of love is to set a candle in the sun.
name: Robert Burton

quote: Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.
name: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: Stand by your man. Give him two arms to cling to and something warm to come to.
name: Tammy Wynette

quote: Love is always being given where it is not required.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: It's useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: If it is your time, love will track you down like a cruise missile.
name: Lynda Barry

quote: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
name: Lawrence Durrell

quote: Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow thee.
name: John Gay

quote: Love without conversation is impossible.
name: Mortimer Adler

quote: All my life, my heart has yearned for a thing I cannot name.
name: Andre Breton

quote: Love ceases to be a pleasure when it ceases to be a secret.
name: Aphra Behn

quote: Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.
name: Samuel Lover

quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Words may be false and full of art; Sighs are the natural language of the heart.
name: Thomas Shadwell

quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
name: Julie Andrews

quote: I think it is all a matter of love: the more you love a memory, the stronger and stranger it is.
name: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: The degree of loving is measured by the degree of giving.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on.
name: Billie Holiday

quote: Love is an energy which exists of itself. It is its own value.
name: Thornton Wilder

quote: Do you have to have a reason for loving?
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: Love is the great miracle cure. Loving ourselves works miracles in our lives.
name: Louise L. Hay

quote: Before I met my husband, I'd never fallen in love. I'd stepped in it a few times.
name: Rita Rudner

quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
name: Brendan Behan

quote: Love is never wrong.
name: Melissa Etheridge

quote: In a full heart there is room for everything, and in an empty heart there is room for nothing.
name: Antonio Porchia

quote: We love but once, for once only are we perfectly equipped for loving.
name: Cyril Connolly

quote: What the world really needs is more love and less paper work.
name: Pearl Bailey

quote: The love which moves the world, according to common Christian belief, is God's love and the love of God.
name: Mortimer Adler

quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
name: Andre Breton

quote: There is no limit to the power of loving.
name: John Morton

quote: Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.
name: Ray Stannard Baker

quote: True love is quiescent, except in the nascent moments of true humility.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: It is easier to love humanity as a whole than to love one's neighbor.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: All love is vanquished by a succeeding love.
name: Ovid

quote: Love is a great beautifier.
name: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Pains of love be sweeter far than all other pleasures are.
name: John Dryden

quote: Is it not by love alone that we succeed in penetrating to the very essence of being?
name: Igor Stravinsky

quote: What force is more potent than love?
name: Igor Stravinsky

quote: At the beginning and at the end of love, the two lovers are embarrassed to find themselves alone.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: The love of liberty is the love of others; the love of power is the love of ourselves.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: Love is the hardest habit to break, and the most difficult to satisfy.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: There is only one real deprivation... and that is not to be able to give one's gifts to those one loves most.
name: May Sarton

quote: In matters of the heart, nothing is true except the improbable.
name: Madame de Stael

quote: People think love is an emotion. Love is good sense.
name: Ken Kesey

quote: The inner reality of love can be recognized only by love.
name: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: Gestures, in love, are incomparably more attractive, effective and valuable than words.
name: Francois Rabelais

quote: No, there's nothing half so sweet in life as love's young dream.
name: Thomas Moore

quote: The love of our private friends is the only preparatory exercise for the love of all men.
name: John Henry Newman

quote: Sometimes it's hard to be a woman giving all your love to just one man.
name: Tammy Wynette

quote: Love means to commit yourself without guarantee.
name: Anne Campbell

quote: Love comes unseen; we only see it go.
name: Henry Austin Dobson

quote: Great thoughts come from the heart.
name: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
name: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: All love is lost but upon God alone.
name: William Dunbar

quote: Oh, love will make a dog howl in rhyme.
name: Francis Beaumont

quote: Love is... never asking for more than you are prepared to give.
name: Kim Casali

quote: If you've got love you've got life, if you can love you can live.
name: Kim Casali

quote: How absurd and delicious it is to be in love with somebody younger than yourself. Everybody should try it.
name: Barbara Pym
